00070 typedef struct ScreenshotData {
00071     unsigned int *dumprect;
00072     int dumpsx, dumpsy;
00073     rcti crop;
00074 
00075     ImageFormatData im_format;
00076 } ScreenshotData;
00077 
00078 /* get shot from frontbuffer */
00079 static unsigned int *screenshot(bContext *C, int *dumpsx, int *dumpsy)
00080 {
00081     wmWindow *win= CTX_wm_window(C);
00082     int x=0, y=0;
00083     unsigned int *dumprect= NULL;
00084     
00085     x= 0;
00086     y= 0;
00087     *dumpsx= win->sizex;
00088     *dumpsy= win->sizey;
00089 
00090     if (*dumpsx && *dumpsy) {
00091         
00092         dumprect= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * (*dumpsx) * (*dumpsy), "dumprect");
00093         glReadBuffer(GL_FRONT);
00094         glReadPixels(x, y, *dumpsx, *dumpsy, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, dumprect);
00095         glFinish();
00096         glReadBuffer(GL_BACK);
00097     }
00098 
00099     return dumprect;
00100 }
00101 
00102 /* call from both exec and invoke */
00103 static int screenshot_data_create(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00104 {
00105     unsigned int *dumprect;
00106     int dumpsx, dumpsy;
00107 
00108     /* do redraw so we don't show popups/menus */
00109     WM_redraw_windows(C);
00110     
00111     dumprect= screenshot(C, &dumpsx, &dumpsy);
00112 
00113     if (dumprect) {
00114         ScreenshotData *scd= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScreenshotData), "screenshot");
00115         ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00116         
00117         scd->dumpsx= dumpsx;
00118         scd->dumpsy= dumpsy;
00119         scd->dumprect= dumprect;
00120         if (sa) {
00121             scd->crop= sa->totrct;
00122         }
00123 
00124         BKE_imformat_defaults(&scd->im_format);
00125 
00126         op->customdata = scd;
00127 
00128         return TRUE;
00129     }
00130     else {
00131         op->customdata= NULL;
00132         return FALSE;
00133     }
00134 }
00135 
00136 static void screenshot_data_free(wmOperator *op)
00137 {
00138     ScreenshotData *scd= op->customdata;
00139 
00140     if (scd) {
00141         if (scd->dumprect)
00142             MEM_freeN(scd->dumprect);
00143         MEM_freeN(scd);
00144         op->customdata= NULL;
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 static void screenshot_crop(ImBuf *ibuf, rcti crop)
00149 {
00150     unsigned int *to= ibuf->rect;
00151     unsigned int *from= ibuf->rect + crop.ymin*ibuf->x + crop.xmin;
00152     int y, cropw= crop.xmax - crop.xmin, croph = crop.ymax - crop.ymin;
00153 
00154     if (cropw > 0 && croph > 0) {
00155         for (y=0; y<croph; y++, to+=cropw, from+=ibuf->x)
00156             memmove(to, from, sizeof(unsigned int)*cropw);
00157 
00158         ibuf->x= cropw;
00159         ibuf->y= croph;
00160     }
00161 }
00162 
00163 static int screenshot_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00164 {
00165     ScreenshotData *scd= op->customdata;
00166 
00167     if (scd == NULL) {
00168         /* when running exec directly */
00169         screenshot_data_create(C, op);
00170         scd= op->customdata;
00171     }
00172 
00173     if (scd) {
00174         if (scd->dumprect) {
00175             ImBuf *ibuf;
00176             char path[FILE_MAX];
00177 
00178             RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
00179             BLI_path_abs(path, G.main->name);
00180 
00181             /* operator ensures the extension */
00182             ibuf= IMB_allocImBuf(scd->dumpsx, scd->dumpsy, 24, 0);
00183             ibuf->rect= scd->dumprect;
00184 
00185             /* crop to show only single editor */
00186             if (!RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "full"))
00187                 screenshot_crop(ibuf, scd->crop);
00188 
00189             if (scd->im_format.planes == R_IMF_PLANES_BW) {
00190                 /* bw screenshot? - users will notice if it fails! */
00191                 IMB_color_to_bw(ibuf);
00192             }
00193             BKE_write_ibuf(ibuf, path, &scd->im_format);
00194 
00195             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00196         }
00197     }
00198 
00199     screenshot_data_free(op);
00200     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00201 }
00202 
00203 static int screenshot_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00204 {
00205     if (screenshot_data_create(C, op)) {
00206         if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00207             return screenshot_exec(C, op);
00208 
00209         /* extension is added by 'screenshot_check' after */
00210         RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", G.relbase_valid ? G.main->name : "//screen");
00211         
00212         WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
00213     
00214         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00215     }   
00216     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00217 }
00218 
00219 static int screenshot_check(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00220 {
00221     ScreenshotData *scd = op->customdata;
00222     return WM_operator_filesel_ensure_ext_imtype(op, scd->im_format.imtype);
00223 }
00224 
00225 static int screenshot_cancel(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00226 {
00227     screenshot_data_free(op);
00228     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00229 }
00230 
00231 static int screenshot_draw_check_prop(PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *prop)
00232 {
00233     const char *prop_id = RNA_property_identifier(prop);
00234 
00235     return !(strcmp(prop_id, "filepath") == 0);
00236 }
00237 
00238 static void screenshot_draw(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
00239 {
00240     uiLayout *layout = op->layout;
00241     ScreenshotData *scd = op->customdata;
00242     PointerRNA ptr;
00243 
00244     /* image template */
00245     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_ImageFormatSettings, &scd->im_format, &ptr);
00246     uiTemplateImageSettings(layout, &ptr);
00247 
00248     /* main draw call */
00249     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, op->type->srna, op->properties, &ptr);
00250     uiDefAutoButsRNA(layout, &ptr, screenshot_draw_check_prop, '\0');
00251 }

00254 void SCREEN_OT_screenshot(wmOperatorType *ot)
00255 {
00256     ot->name = "Save Screenshot"; /* weak: opname starting with 'save' makes filewindow give save-over */
00257     ot->idname = "SCREEN_OT_screenshot";
00258     
00259     ot->invoke = screenshot_invoke;
00260     ot->check = screenshot_check;
00261     ot->exec = screenshot_exec;
00262     ot->cancel = screenshot_cancel;
00263     ot->ui = screenshot_draw;
00264     ot->poll = WM_operator_winactive;
00265     
00266     ot->flag = 0;
00267     
00268     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE|IMAGEFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_SAVE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00269     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "full", 1, "Full Screen", "");
00270 }

00272 /* *************** screenshot movie job ************************* */
00273 
00274 typedef struct ScreenshotJob {
00275     Main *bmain;
00276     Scene *scene;
00277     unsigned int *dumprect;
00278     int x, y, dumpsx, dumpsy;
00279     short *stop;
00280     short *do_update;
00281     ReportList reports;
00282 } ScreenshotJob;
00283 
00284 
00285 static void screenshot_freejob(void *sjv)
00286 {
00287     ScreenshotJob *sj= sjv;
00288     
00289     if (sj->dumprect)
00290         MEM_freeN(sj->dumprect);
00291     
00292     MEM_freeN(sj);
00293 }
00294 
00295 
00296 /* called before redraw notifiers, copies a new dumprect */
00297 static void screenshot_updatejob(void *sjv)
00298 {
00299     ScreenshotJob *sj= sjv;
00300     unsigned int *dumprect;
00301     
00302     if (sj->dumprect==NULL) {
00303         dumprect= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * sj->dumpsx * sj->dumpsy, "dumprect");
00304         glReadPixels(sj->x, sj->y, sj->dumpsx, sj->dumpsy, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, dumprect);
00305         glFinish();
00306         
00307         sj->dumprect= dumprect;
00308     }
00309 }
00310 
00311 
00312 /* only this runs inside thread */
00313 static void screenshot_startjob(void *sjv, short *stop, short *do_update, float *UNUSED(progress))
00314 {
00315     ScreenshotJob *sj= sjv;
00316     RenderData rd= sj->scene->r;
00317     bMovieHandle *mh= BKE_get_movie_handle(sj->scene->r.im_format.imtype);
00318     
00319     /* we need this as local variables for renderdata */
00320     rd.frs_sec= U.scrcastfps;
00321     rd.frs_sec_base= 1.0f;
00322     
00323     if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(rd.im_format.imtype)) {
00324         if (!mh->start_movie(sj->scene, &rd, sj->dumpsx, sj->dumpsy, &sj->reports)) {
00325             printf("screencast job stopped\n");
00326             return;
00327         }
00328     }
00329     else
00330         mh= NULL;
00331     
00332     sj->stop= stop;
00333     sj->do_update= do_update;
00334     
00335     *do_update= 1; // wait for opengl rect
00336     
00337     while (*stop==0) {
00338         
00339         if (sj->dumprect) {
00340             
00341             if (mh) {
00342                 if (mh->append_movie(&rd, rd.sfra, rd.cfra, (int *)sj->dumprect,
00343                                     sj->dumpsx, sj->dumpsy, &sj->reports))
00344                 {
00345                     BKE_reportf(&sj->reports, RPT_INFO, "Appended frame: %d", rd.cfra);
00346                     printf("Appended frame %d\n", rd.cfra);
00347                 }
00348                 else {
00349                     break;
00350                 }
00351             }
00352             else {
00353                 ImBuf *ibuf= IMB_allocImBuf(sj->dumpsx, sj->dumpsy, rd.im_format.planes, 0);
00354                 char name[FILE_MAX];
00355                 int ok;
00356                 
00357                 BKE_makepicstring(name, rd.pic, sj->bmain->name, rd.cfra, rd.im_format.imtype, rd.scemode & R_EXTENSION, TRUE);
00358                 
00359                 ibuf->rect= sj->dumprect;
00360                 ok= BKE_write_ibuf(ibuf, name, &rd.im_format);
00361                 
00362                 if (ok==0) {
00363                     printf("Write error: cannot save %s\n", name);
00364                     BKE_reportf(&sj->reports, RPT_INFO, "Write error: cannot save %s\n", name);
00365                     break;
00366                 }
00367                 else {
00368                     printf("Saved file: %s\n", name);
00369                     BKE_reportf(&sj->reports, RPT_INFO, "Saved file: %s", name);
00370                 }
00371                 
00372                 /* imbuf knows which rects are not part of ibuf */
00373                 IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);    
00374             }
00375             
00376             MEM_freeN(sj->dumprect);
00377             sj->dumprect= NULL;
00378             
00379             *do_update= 1;
00380             
00381             rd.cfra++;
00382 
00383         }
00384         else 
00385             PIL_sleep_ms(U.scrcastwait);
00386     }
00387     
00388     if (mh)
00389         mh->end_movie();
00390 
00391     BKE_report(&sj->reports, RPT_INFO, "Screencast job stopped");
00392 }
00393 
00394 static int screencast_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00395 {
00396     bScreen *screen= CTX_wm_screen(C);
00397     wmJob *steve= WM_jobs_get(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), screen, "Screencast", 0);
00398     ScreenshotJob *sj= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ScreenshotJob), "screenshot job");
00399 
00400     /* setup sj */
00401     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "full")) {
00402         wmWindow *win= CTX_wm_window(C);
00403         sj->x= 0;
00404         sj->y= 0;
00405         sj->dumpsx= win->sizex;
00406         sj->dumpsy= win->sizey;
00407     } 
00408     else {
00409         ScrArea *curarea= CTX_wm_area(C);
00410         sj->x= curarea->totrct.xmin;
00411         sj->y= curarea->totrct.ymin;
00412         sj->dumpsx= curarea->totrct.xmax - sj->x;
00413         sj->dumpsy= curarea->totrct.ymax - sj->y;
00414     }
00415     sj->bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00416     sj->scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00417 
00418     BKE_reports_init(&sj->reports, RPT_PRINT);
00419 
00420     /* setup job */
00421     WM_jobs_customdata(steve, sj, screenshot_freejob);
00422     WM_jobs_timer(steve, 0.1, 0, NC_SCREEN|ND_SCREENCAST);
00423     WM_jobs_callbacks(steve, screenshot_startjob, NULL, screenshot_updatejob, NULL);
00424     
00425     WM_jobs_start(CTX_wm_manager(C), steve);
00426     
00427     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCREEN|ND_SCREENCAST, screen);
00428     
00429     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00430 }
00431 
00432 void SCREEN_OT_screencast(wmOperatorType *ot)
00433 {
00434     ot->name = "Make Screencast";
00435     ot->idname = "SCREEN_OT_screencast";
00436     
00437     ot->invoke = WM_operator_confirm;
00438     ot->exec = screencast_exec;
00439     ot->poll = WM_operator_winactive;
00440     
00441     ot->flag = 0;
00442     
00443     RNA_def_property(ot->srna, "filepath", PROP_STRING, PROP_FILEPATH);
00444     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "full", 1, "Full Screen", "");
00445 }
